content.heroIntro:
BAHIA CENTER represents a new standard of contemporary living in Torrevieja's vibrant Centro district. Developed by the trusted INTERCOSTA VILLAS, this exciting project delivers 5 premium penthouses and apartments ranging from €219,000, combining modern design with exceptional value on Spain's Costa Blanca. With completion scheduled for September 1st, 2027, BAHIA CENTER offers an outstanding investment opportunity in Europe's largest expat community, where English is widely spoken and international amenities are abundant.

Located in the heart of Centro, BAHIA CENTER provides direct access to Torrevieja's finest attractions: the Blue Flag beach of Playa del Cura, world-class golf courses like Villamartín just 15 minutes away, and cosmopolitan dining and shopping. Each property features premium finishes including air conditioning pre-installation, fitted kitchens with appliances, thermal break double glazing, and private parking. Whether seeking a primary residence, holiday retreat, or investment opportunity, BAHIA CENTER delivers exceptional quality at 45% below Costa Blanca North prices.

With 1-3 bedrooms across 52-137m² of living space, BAHIA CENTER caters to diverse buyer profiles. The development offers communal facilities, landscaped gardens, and modern security systems. INTERCOSTA VILLAS' reputation for quality construction and customer satisfaction makes BAHIA CENTER an intelligent choice for international buyers seeking peace of mind and exceptional value in one of Spain's most desirable coastal destinations.

locationSection.intro: Centro Torrevieja sits at the heart of Spain's most cosmopolitan coastal town, where Mediterranean charm meets modern European convenience. This prestigious neighborhood combines beachfront proximity with urban sophistication, making it ideal for buyers seeking active lifestyles without sacrificing services. Centro offers immediate access to Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja, Spain's premier public healthcare facility with 24-hour emergency services, alongside private options like Quirónsalud Torrevieja. The area pulses with international energy, featuring numerous English-speaking clinics, quality schools including El Limonar International School (British curriculum), and extensive shopping at Mercadona, Carrefour, Lidl, and specialist stores stocking British products. Playa del Cura, awarded the prestigious Blue Flag for water quality and safety, lies moments away, while the golden sands of La Mata beach stretch just 6km north. Centro's reputation as Europe's largest expat community ensures exceptional English-language services, making it perfect for international residents seeking seamless integration.
